comments:
Build date: 2006-03-09
    Eclipse: (2006-02-23-1656)
    EMF: (2006-03-09)
    UML2: (S2006-03-02-1338)
OS: Windows XP
Step to recreate problem:

1. Get UM2_2.0_DBCS_Conformatce_Test_Cases.doc from ftp://rtpgsa.raleigh.ibm.com/projects/w/wswb/anonymous/out/IES_3.2/Enablement%20Testcases/UML2/
2. Perform Step 1 to Step 12 after following  the document.
3. Perform Step 13 and fail to apply a stereotype. This happens under both ASCII and DBCS.
4. The following error logs are displayed in console.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 131180 ***

Note that you have chosen the wrong type for the stereotype property - it should be UML2::UnlimitedNatural instead of uml2::UnlimitedNatural (difference in case). This kind of issue will be less likely in .uml models (second part of test suite) since the primitive type library has been renamed to "UMLPrimitiveTypes" (hence there aren't two types with such similar names).
I made sure the function worked well on Build20060309. Thank you.
